column4: does anyone know how to fix avahi? I can't see my desktop from my laptop. Anyone know what port to open?
thanks but I can connect using the IP of the desktop, but using the 'hostname.local' doesn't work
the issue is between jaunty and osx? where Interpid worked?
did you change the jaunty name servers to open dns?
chronographer, did you change the jaunty name servers to open dns? No.
the previous link suggested it as a solution
the name servers are listed at http://www.opendns.org
yes, it seems to have restarted resolv.conf
it is sudo su on an ubuntu box
